#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef map<int,int> mi;
 
#define si(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sii(a,b) scanf("%d %d",&a,&b)
#define nl printf("\n");
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end()
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rf(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define clr(x,a) memset(x,a,sizeof(x))
#define MAX 100010
#define MOD 1000000007
 
ll n,m;
ll a[MAX],b[MAX],mk[MAX];
vi v;
vi w;
 
int main(){
    ll r,k,i,c=0,x=0,y=0,j,t,l,x1=0,y1=0;
    ll z=0,ans=0;string p[1000];
 
    clr(a,0);
    clr(mk,0);
    f(i,2,sqrt(1e9)+1000){
        if(!a[i]){
            w.pb(i);
            for(j=2*i;j<sqrt(1e9)+1000;j+=i)
                a[j]=1;
        }
    }
 
    f(i,0,w.size()){
        v.pb(w[i]*w[i]);
    }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>x>>y;
        vi::iterator it,rt;
        it=lower_bound(all(v),x);
        rt=upper_bound(all(v),y);
        cout<<(rt-v.begin())-(it-v.begin())<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
